name: NCSF Nintendo DS Audio File
summary: File created in the Nitro Composer Sound Format (NCSF), an audio format based on the Portable Sound Format ( .PSF files) and used for storing Nintendo DS music; typically extracted from an NDS audio file ( .SDAT ) and can be played with Winamp or Foobar2000 with supporting plug-ins.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Nullsoft Winamp with NCSF player plug-in
